author: ningjiang
msg: Fixed the CS error of MailConsumer

author: alexdma
msg: Applied patch by Alberto Musetti that unifies Web templates for ontonet, reasoners and rules endpoints. This is required for STANBOL-177

author: sergey
msg: fix compiler warning ("unmappable character for encoding ASCII")

author: simonw
msg: LUCENE-2793: Directory#createOutput & Directory#openInput now accept an IOContext instead of a buffer size to allow low level optimizations for different usecases like merging, flushing and reading.
